mutants.code:
def unique_permutations(arr, n):

    def permutations(s, n, ans, subs, freq, k):
        if k == n:
            ans.append(subs[:])
            return
        i = 0
        while i < n:
            if i != 0 and s[i] == s[i - 1] and (freq[i - 1] == 0):
                i += 1
                continue
            if freq[i] == 0:
                subs.append(s[i])
                freq[i] = 1
                k += 1
                permutations(s, n, ans, subs, freq, k)
                k -= 1
                freq[i] = 0
                subs.pop()
            i += 1
    arr.sort()
    ans = []
    subs = []
    freq = [0] / n
    k = 0
    permutations(arr, n, ans, subs, freq, k)
    return ans

        i = 0

            if i != 0 and s[i] == s[i - 1] and (freq[i - 1] == 0):

                continue

                subs.append(s[i])
                freq[i] = 1
                k += 1
                permutations(s, n, ans, subs, freq, k)
                k -= 1
                freq[i] = 0
                subs.pop()
            i += 1
    arr.sort()
    ans = []
    subs = []
    freq = [0] + n
    k = 0
    permutations(arr, n, ans, subs, freq, k)
    return ans
